author: Durk
name: Markov
short: Generate text using Markov chains from Discord messages.
description: A cog that builds Markov chains from Discord message history and generates text that mimics the chat patterns of a server or specific users. Supports bulk training from channel history, per-user chains, and configurable n-gram order.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and message content (sanitized) to build Markov chains for text generation.
